website_summaries.verdict: One of the best budget love seats you can buy to increase outdoor seating for large groups with minimal costs.
pros: Uses extra strong fabric with heavy-duty stitching and rivets to hold the weight of two people comfortably
Comes with additional accessory features like mesh cup holders and pockets
cons: Armrests slide down the support rod while sitting or getting up and down

customer_reviews.title: Intimate Moments Around the Campfire
customer_reviews.text: Our new favorite camping chair! So far so great. We bought this for a recent camping trip after a long period of no camping(so we needed a few things!) As you can see from the photos, it makes for a more intimate and more memorable time around the campfire.At least I think so. The chair is sturdy and seems to be well made. I'll update if that changes. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: April Gant

customer_reviews.title: I use this a lot and am mostly happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot and am mostly happy with it. It mostly works as advertised, but the armrests frequently slide down in the back (notice in the photo how they're just attached by sliding rings that don't lock into any particular spot but just sort of grip the support rod). Also, it's uncomfortable to sit in the middle because of the support rod, so it's not quite ideal for three close friends wanting to huddle by the fire or something. But it's fine for two average size people. Also bear in mind that it's pretty heavy--you don't want to backpack with this thing. But it's nice for car camping.
customer_reviews.author: N. Luchsinger

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dogs for when we camp, and they took to it immediately over the ones they had before.
customer_reviews.author: D. KimTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice option.
customer_reviews.text: A nice light weight, and no bar in the center. Height is not an issue for us as we wanted to be able to share it with little kids and a small dog. stable enough to get up and down fine on flat ground. As to comfort, can only speak to having sat in it for an hour at a time but it was fine for that. Cute idea and easier than hauling two heavier chairs.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Hold a lot of teens at once!
customer_reviews.text: We needed another camping chair and decide to try out the loveseat version. It’s sturdy and comfortable. It is low, but we chose that on purpose and like it. The first time we set it up, 6-7 teens gently piled onto it to give it a test, and it held up just fine to that brief event.
customer_reviews.author: pradiata

customer_reviews.title: You should definitely by this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Every time I took this somewhere someone wanted to know where I got it. Easily transported. A little more comfortable than one seat by itself. Can definitely fit 2 average size adults and one child Very reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: VGLeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: A Sweet Camping Loveseat
customer_reviews.text: What a cozy way to watch an outdoor movie with your favorite person beside you! This fits two adults comfortably - I'm 130 lbs and my partners is probably about 170 lbs. There was plenty of room. This chair is a bit shorter than most, but folds up into a reasonable size with carrying bag. The cup holders fit a can or solo cup and there are two pockets on the back of each chair for storage. Already a favorite item of mine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeny Kc

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to have 2 chairs, only gave 4 stars bc the bag that holds it broke after a couple uses so that does make it hard to carry. But the chair itself is still going strong and everyone loves it! BUT if you have had knee/hip issues and it's hard to get up this chair is a lil low. I have to pull my dad out of it bc of that. So not for people with joint issues.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Drake

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, my boyfriend and I use it every time we go camping. 2 cupholders, and a mesh pocket in the back to put stuff. Only complaint is it does sit a little low to the ground and may hurt your back after extended period of time. but otherwise love this!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fine and affordable camping luxury!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the double chair, almost a camping loveseat. We've owned a couple. This one is definitely the best, despite costing less than many options out there. The folding legs do well on slightly uneven ground and feel very stable. Terrific for car camping, and it actually saves you space over two separate chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D. Lossing

customer_reviews.title: Lovely chair
customer_reviews.text: Love having this chair. We use it for camping , the river, soccer games. It’s a bit lower to the ground then normal chairs but having two seats is perfect. I can either cuddle with my kids or lay the baby next to me so she can wiggle. Our bag ripped for it after putting it back on about six times
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: The chair is pretty low to the ground
customer_reviews.text: This was an "okay" little couch. The arm rest slide down, so lounging can become a challenge. The chair is pretty low to the ground, so if you have challenges going from sitting to standing without having to use some kind of assistance, this chair is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tryshah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The cool soccer mom
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to clean. Easy to haul around. This is a great quality chair! It’s a good size for 2 adults or 1 adult on one side and a crazy active toddler on the other OR 3-4 little kids. I mainly use this chair at my kids soccer games and get lots of compliments on it. It’s very durable. I have had this chair for about a year and It’s seen a lot of action. It is still holding up well. It also has 2 good size storage pouches on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Brighid Krzan

customer_reviews.title: This chair is great for couples
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great for couples, or seating multiples! I enjoyed cuddling up to my guy in it. My dog also enjoyed cuddling up on our laps!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great for those Soccer Saturdays
customer_reviews.text: These are great portable chairs to take for those Soccer Saturdays. The only problem I have with it, is that it sits low to the ground. So it might not be great for someone taller than 5'6" or has problems with their knees. I would recommend it more for kids than adults.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for two years now. Still working great and in good condition. We loved it so much, we bought another one from a different company. Out of the two- This one sits a little lower. It may also be hard to get out of if you have bad knees, or bad back. Our other one sits higher and is better for my back. I recommend a higher chair for any one over 50.
customer_reviews.author: maak

customer_reviews.title: Spacious & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This chair is SO MUCH better than I expected. It's very spacious. It's plenty of room for myself, ny husband and our 4 year old daughter. It's comfortable to sit in, light weight and compact for carrying. The pockets on the chair backs are large and very useful. The lime green color is actually super cute. This chair is so comfortable that I think I could nap in it! I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Starr

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome for camping
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for camping, tailgating, beach day, etc. My boyfriend and I love having the ability to cuddle in front of a campfire. Everyone that passes by comments on how comfy we look! Also, it is much cheaper than some other love seats.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Brought us closer together
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be quite sturdy. Should last for multiple seasons. Created a more intimate experience while watching our kiddos sporting events. Nothing better than wispering put downs about the refs to eachother during a game.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyMidwest

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a month and have taken it to numerous baseball games. The carrying bag tore at the seem after the 2nd use. The chair itself it great! It sits lower to the ground then our other chairs. My husband and I don't get to sit together too often but the few minutes here and there, it holds both of us. I've gotten a lot of compliments on the chair.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Light, and Fits in the bag it came with
customer_reviews.text: This chair gets a 5 star review from me because it does exactly what I bought it for. It unfolds easily, it has two cup holders, it folds back up easily, and it actually goes back into the carry bag easily. I find it comfortable for two people and it feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic chair, perfect for playing guitar or any similar instrument at a campfire! Thats why i bought it in the first place and it shines above any camp chair ive ever uncomfortably played a guitar in! And on a plus side theres no arm rest between you and your girlfriend. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great loveseat type double seat folding chair
customer_reviews.text: Great loveseat type double seat folding chair! It sits a little lower for better stability, and seems to be a little more rugged than most folding chairs. It was well worth the price, and well worth it to purchase a quality Coleman product. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: djinn

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! They are great for camping and outdoor activities. It is not too heavy to carry and pretty comfortable. I can sit alone or sit with my little kid or other grown up too. I can sit with both of my little kids also. I took out one star because the case/bag was ripped in 5min using. It was our first use..
customer_reviews.author: Livingintheheaven

customer_reviews.title: Decent for a season or two
customer_reviews.text: Thinner poles and fabric than our similar one from Bass Pro Shops. Comfort is high and it is light. I’m afraid it won’t hold up over time since the fabric and the poles are so thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Nice and wide
customer_reviews.text: This chair is pretty sturdy. I love mostly that it's nice and wide! 4 kids can fit on this easily. The only thing that I noticed is that it sits pretty low, but, I don't know if that's just the standard height of a Coleman chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jane's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good but short
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair, it is shorter than most chairs though. My mom has bad knees and had a hard time getting out. Other than that it’s a very sturdy well made chair. Perfect for watching my kids baseball and softball games.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair. I am 150lbs and my husband is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair. I am 150lbs and my husband is 230lbs and it holds us just fine. I like the fact that it sits lower than most chairs as we bring it to festivals and concerts where lawn chairs are allowed.
customer_reviews.author: alwayssewing

customer_reviews.title: So far this chair seems to be made of excellent quality. My husband
customer_reviews.text: So far this chair seems to be made of excellent quality. My husband, myself and our two small children all sit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gibson

customer_reviews.title: ... music festival and used it yesterday and it was PERFECT for our needs
customer_reviews.text: we got this for an outdoor music festival and used it yesterday and it was PERFECT for our needs. roomy, comfy, a snap to open and close and easy to carry. it's great because it's a 2 seater in one carry bag. would buy again and definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: pws

customer_reviews.title: Two chairs, but only carry one!
customer_reviews.text: Folds up almost to the same size as a single chair. The chair is comfortable. The only issue is it seems to hold onto rain more than normal fold-able chairs. I usually pack it up so it is not rained on so that isn't a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: UPtechGUY

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Plenty of space for myself and my doggies!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bergerson

customer_reviews.title: The bag is not durable and armrest could be improved
customer_reviews.text: The chair works well for my husband and I at soccer games. However, we are a little disappointed in the bag as we’ve only used it twice and it is already ripping. The armrest also slide down as you sit. The quality is not that great considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Samanka

customer_reviews.title: A Little Low
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose BUT this sits low to the ground. If you have bad knees it might be hard to get up and down. I've had about 300 pounds on this and it didn't budge. I like the color, the bag and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie W

customer_reviews.title: Must have for trips anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic chair, even for 1 person the room is nice to have. Sits 2 comfortably, storage in the back is nice to throw things you don’t want to get sandy, must have for beach trips compact to carry.
customer_reviews.author: skylar ku

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: We get compliments on this thing all the time. So nice to carry only one bag and have plenty of room for two (and occasionally a little one with us too). Very solid quality.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Love the love seat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Other than it's a little bit heavy, but it's no problem to carry it. All of our other friends are asking about where we got it from. They want to buy one too. We got it at an affordable price. Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mau Muyco

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great quality and not extremely bulky when folded. The color is as expected. My only complaint is that it sits lower than a single chair in this style so you have to get down further to sit (and put more effort into getting up) which could potentially be a problem for someone with a bad back. Other than that my children and I love it! Would recommend to anyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Shaylene  D

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it for sitting by the fire pit or camping , bright and colorful . We had one before 👍
customer_reviews.author: kristin Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this for soccer. My daughter and I can comfortably watch my son play soccer. I liked only having to carry one chair instead of two for us.
customer_reviews.author: VB2CPK14

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor double chair
customer_reviews.text: Got it to sit with the dog in front of the fire. Fits both easily and gets her off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kax Kaxington

customer_reviews.title: Best camping loveseat ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this seat for two! We get asked where we got it all the time! Lightweight, easy to take anywhere and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: My name is Mom. Yeah,  I'm kind of a big deal:)

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable- however, if you have hard time getting out of chairs....this is not for you. This is very low to ground about 8" shorter then average camp chair height.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Busam

customer_reviews.title: Good sports chair
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this chair as we attend a lot of sporting events for our children and it’s easier to carry one chair. Comfortable, a little low to the ground so it could be hard for some people to get out of. Only reason I gave it 4 stars was because the bag ripped pretty easy after using it a few times
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Monty

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: used for camping, and should have bought another one, everyone fights to sit in it. love the pocket in back
customer_reviews.author: Judi Salmon

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Was a lot shorter than I expected! Would be great for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this camp chair! Always gets stolen in groups because its great to sit with friends (or your dog) I only gave it 4 starts because i had to return the first one because the arm did pop off (should be more secure) but they returned it and the second one has been great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea E. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy and cute
customer_reviews.text: My 23 year old daughter and her two small children cuddled comfortably in this while camping! The kids loved it and my daughter thought it was very cool! Looks great and fits 3 small children or an adult mommy and a few small kiddos easily!
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Jones

customer_reviews.title: They requested this amazing double chair so they could sit next to each ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son-in-law camp all the time. They requested this amazing double chair so they could sit next to each other while camping. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camping/beach chair!!!super comfy and great size!
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this chair! It is sturdy enough for my 6'4" 260 lb husband to sit with me, or all three kids can sit together. We took it to the beach and use it at ball games. Great chair!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a tad low to the ground but we still love it. All the space of two chairs and only half the work to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Aldrich5891

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Its a good chair, just really low to the ground. Hard to get up from.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Zdrojkowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this!! I bought it for my pups... they love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Yia Yia

customer_reviews.title: Lower Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I wish I had read in reviews is how low the chair is. I’m only 5’4 but sitting in this chair for a longer period of time makes my knees hurt when I get up. Other than that the chair is great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great camping chair!
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews that it was low to the ground, which is true, but that wasn't a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Y

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: The kids love sitting with me and its nice being able to cuddle by the fire. Can hold 2 adults no problem and the bag isnt that much bigger than a single seat bag which is nice for space storage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gurney

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair. The reason I am giving it 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair. The reason I am giving it 3 stars is because the bag was ripped when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and great! Very very low to the ground though. Not a big deal, just shorter than the average chair. The pocket in the back is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fun Chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair for couples - sturdy and fun to sit close for outside concerts and events.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair, very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Seat height was a little low to get out, but this helps sit more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC L. WINGROVE

customer_reviews.title: Score!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and so did everyone at the ball field! It was great because my 10 year old would like to nap during brother's games and it was a good size for him to curl up on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best seats of my last campout
customer_reviews.text: One of the best seats of my last campout. Super comfortable and strong along with being a perfect seat for couples to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very short.
customer_reviews.text: Sits very low. You're almost sitting on the ground with this. Should be at least another 12" taller.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! Perfect for two and low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality from Coleman
customer_reviews.text: From day one the screw/plug that hold the seats on to the frame in the front keeps popping out. I would have excepted better quality from Coleman!
customer_reviews.author: Donna J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! We have family that has some, so we had to get one! Great quality, fits in the bag nicely. Pockets on the back are cool. Love the color and I have a feeling it will hold up well!! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair. Great for craft shows. It is VERY cozy if you sit with someone else... so take that how you like. I love it for my craft shows because I can sit on one side and have my cash box and some other things on the other seat. It is just so handy to have the extra space, and it really doesn't take up much more room than a single chair.
customer_reviews.author: APG Studios

customer_reviews.title: ... chair thinking it for two but it is honestly perfect for me to lounge on by myself
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair thinking it for two but it is honestly perfect for me to lounge on by myself. I love it. Can't wait to take it camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amber F.

customer_reviews.title: Like the chair but it's low to the ground
customer_reviews.text: Like the chair but it's low to the ground, packs up about as small as a normal camp chair though so this is great for bonfires and camping while cuddling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was sort of disappointed with how short this chair was
customer_reviews.text: I was sort of disappointed with how short this chair was. Felt like I was really close to the ground
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and roomy
customer_reviews.text: A lot of room with this! We comfortably fit (me and my girlfriend) and sometimes our dog (20lb) will jump up and join us to make it cozy but comfortable. It’s pretty light weight and easy to transport. Much easier to transport/carry/set up than individual chairs. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: My Great Dane pup, my one year old and I love this bench for nights at the softball field. Plenty of room for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a present more than 2 years ago and it was absolutely loved. Comfy enough for 2 not-that-skinny people, and good quality. Definitely recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle with your honey
customer_reviews.text: Durable, holds me and my husband. However, it is SHORT. Look at the height and sit in a similar chair before buying it. Good to sit by my honey, however, no matter how short the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Crosser

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sits low to the ground. Works for me but I am short. Really short.
customer_reviews.author: NKM

customer_reviews.title: Top 5 - Fave Amazon Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously one of my favorite items I have ever purchased from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: BamaAmber

customer_reviews.title: The only problem is that I have to buy another ...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that I have to buy another because everybody loves it. a 5' and 6' person sitting beside each other can both be comfortable
customer_reviews.author: spot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, durable, and extremely comfortable! you can lean on each other and cuddle very comfortably :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Good seat, needs better carry/storage bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide, comfortable seats. Lightweight and easy to fold. Arm rests do not stay up. Carry/storage bag is thin and tore within a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Raycher

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs For Camping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chair to go camping with family and friends. It Fits two People maybe even three.. Also has two Cupholders and Folds Pretty Easily. I Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mimi m

customer_reviews.title: This one is for the beach. Taller ones for the campfires.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Just not expecting the seat so low to the ground or the back so short. Lax is the word for the shortness. Just too old to get out of it these days. I will look for the larger item. I am a coleman fan way back from the blue one we had in the 80s.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M

customer_reviews.title: Too low to the ground!
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable for tall people, too low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn S. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this chair! it was comfortable, perfect for cuddling and I even layed down on it for a nap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short chair
customer_reviews.text: It’s for children, very low to the ground but nice for my kids 8&3. Folds up like a normal size chair so that is nice
customer_reviews.author: T.Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have taken it camping a couple times already comfortably holds 2 adults or 4 kids ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are the best chairs ever, I am now a proud owner of two double chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this chair. We bring it with us for family functions, camping and have it on our porch just incase we need more seats.
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome. Perfect for cuddling up with my boyfriend and dog at the bonfire
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price already have people asking we're ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price already have people asking we're I got it, folds up nice not heavy to carry around, only downside is the arm rest won't stay up keeps sliding down
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love this camp chair
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this camp chair! It's a quality product. It sits lower to the ground than expected, but we still enjoy it. The only complaint we have is that the bag it came in ripped within 3 weeks of using it. Overall, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is made good and does what it is expected to
customer_reviews.text: A little low to the ground and slightly heavy, but lighter than carrying two separate chairs. Is made good and does what it is expected to!
customer_reviews.author: Chantal*

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: Fits me, my hubby, and our 4 year old. And the back pockets are great for storing things you don't want covered in beach sand
customer_reviews.author: Allie D

customer_reviews.title: Good chair.Bad Holding bag
customer_reviews.text: The chair has held up pretty good and is pretty comfortable the only problem Is that the bag to carry it has already got a hole in it and we’ve only taken it to one festival.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and well made great for little one to lounge ...
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and well made great for little one to lounge on and fall asleep at events
customer_reviews.author: not picky

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT chair, great price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just got it last week, it's very comfy, comfortably fits to average sized adults...So much lighter to carry then our old separate chairs.I should have gotten it sooner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Retro

customer_reviews.title: better of buying for kids
customer_reviews.text: Lower to the ground then expected, better of buying for kids.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair for sitting next to my man by ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair for sitting next to my man by the fire! Low to the ground, but very comfortable! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ppaddon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Used the double seater for our camping trip and everyone was fighting over it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi A

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband love this chair. It was so nice to sit and snuggle under the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: The Smith Family

product_meta.title: Coleman 2000019354 Quattro Lax Double Quad Chair
product_meta.description: Enjoy a cozy seat for 2 at the campsite, BBQ, or beach with the Coleman Quattro Lax Double Quad Chair. Supporting up to 225 pounds per seat, this roomy outdoor chair is designed for 2 people to sit back and relax comfortably. It features a durable steel frame and offers each person a spacious 21.5-inch seat with a 14.6-inch height. Mesh cup holders on each end let you and your companion keep your favorite beverages close at hand. This folding chair also includes 2 large seatback pockets for books, cell phones, and other essentials. The portable camping chair folds into the included carry bag for easy transport and storage.
feature_bullets: Outdoor double quad chair seats 2 people comfortably
Includes 2 mesh cup holders and seatback pockets for accessories
Roomy 21.5-inch seat and 14.6-inch sitting height for each person
Folds for compact storage and transport in included carry bag
Supports up to 225 pounds per seat
